mapper.select: select count(*) from groups g left join group_members gm on gm.group_name = g.group_name left join users u on u.username = gm.username where g.group_name like #{keyword}

select g.id, g.sn, g.group_name, g.description, g.created_at, g.updated_at, u.username from groups g left join group_members gm on gm.group_name = g.group_name left join users u on u.username = gm.username where g.group_name like #{keyword} order by ${sort} ${dir} limit #{offset}, #{size}
